title: Optimal Power
description: Otis Colip had a good life once. Nice home, brilliant wife, a job he could be proud of. Now he lives in a park: an artificially heated space set aside for the homeless, in a city that seems to be collapsing around him.He wants his old life back, and he’ll pay almost any price to get it.Optimal Power is a tale of the near-future, in which access is everything—and it’s easy to keep people out. If Otis wants back in, it’ll cost him a lot more than money.
author: Chris      Edwards
